page.title: cletris : A Tetris like game written in Common Lisp.

page:
cletris is a Tetris game It is developed on Debian GNU/Linux , using SBCL .
cletris was written by Nicolas Lamirault and is available under a MIT style license.
Installation using asdf-install
*> (require 'asdf-install) *> (asdf-install:install 'cletris)
Manual Installation
Download a cletris tarball or checkout source code from GitHub : $> git clone git://github.com/nlamirault/cletris.git
cletris needs cl-ppcre, pal, and their dependencies.
ASDF is used for compilation. Register the .asd file, e.g. by symlinking it, then compile cletris using asdf:operate.
$ ln -sf `pwd`/cletris.asd /path/to/your/registry/ * (asdf:operate 'asdf:load-op :cletris)
Usage
Start Cletris using an usernane : * (cletris:cletris "guest")
